perturbation.original_text: The parties to this Agreement are The Joint Corp., a Delaware corporation ("we," "us," the "Company," or "The Joint Corp."); _________________________________________, as Franchise Owner ("you," "Franchise Owner," or "Franchisee"), and, if you are a partnership, corporation, or limited liability company, your "Principal Owners" (defined below).
perturbation.changed_text: The parties to this Agreement are The Joint Corp., a Delaware corporation ("we," "us," the "Company," or "Joint Corp."); _________________________________________, as Location Owner ("you," "Location Owner," or "Licensee"), and, if you are a partnership, corporation, or limited liability company, your "Main Owners" (defined below).
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Franchise Owner' to 'Location Owner' and 'Franchisee' to 'Licensee,' and 'Principal Owners' to 'Main Owners' introduces inconsistent terminology, as the contract continues to use the original terms in subsequent sections, creating confusion about which terms are interchangeable.

perturbation.original_text: You must open your franchise for business no later than nine (9) months from the Effective Date of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: You must open your store for business no later than nine (9) months from the Effective Date of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'franchise' to 'store' in this section introduces confusion, since the contract still refers to 'franchise' and 'Franchise Agreement' elsewhere, creating ambiguity as to the nature of the business being operated.

perturbation.original_text: Therefore, during the term of this Agreement, neither you, nor any Principal Owner, nor any member of your immediate family or of the immediate family of any Principal Owner, shall perform services for, or have any direct or indirect interest as a disclosed or beneficial owner, investor, partner, director, officer, employee, manager, consultant, representative, or agent in, any business that offers products or services the same as or similar to those offered or sold at The Joint Corp. Location franchises.
perturbation.changed_text: Therefore, during the term of this Agreement, neither you, nor any Main Investor, nor any member of your immediate family or of the immediate family of any Main Investor, shall perform services for, or have any direct or indirect interest as a disclosed or beneficial owner, investor, partner, director, officer, employee, manager, consultant, representative, or agent in, any business that offers products or services the same as or similar to those offered or sold at The Joint Corp. clinics.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Principal Owner' to 'Main Investor' and 'Location franchises' to 'clinics' creates uncertainty about whether 'Main Investor' is equivalent to 'Principal Owner' and whether 'clinic' is a type of 'franchise'. The original terminology 'Franchise' is still being used in other parts of the agreement.
